USER PERSONA: Design Agency, Logo design, UI/UX, Business card design, Social media content design, Copywriting, Branding, Motion Graphics Design - United States

Table 01: DEMOGRAPHICS

| Data Points | Answers |
| --- | --- |
| Name | Maya Johnson |
| Age | 30 |
| Occupation | Marketing Manager |
| Annual Income | $85,000 |
| Marital Status | Single |
| Family Situation | Living with Roommates |
| Location | Urban area, East Coast of the United States |

Table 02: USER DESCRIPTION
Maya is a 30-year-old marketing manager with a passion for creating visually appealing content and messaging. She works for a medium-sized software company on the East Coast and enjoys collaborating with creative agencies for various design projects. Maya is single and lives with roommates in an urban area.

Table 03: PSYCHOGRAPHICS

| Data Points | Answers |
| --- | --- |
| Personal Characteristics | Creative, detail-oriented, organized, open-minded, adaptable |
| Hobbies | Photography, attending art exhibits, traveling |
| Interests | Branding, marketing strategy, social media trends, design trends |
| Personal Aspirations | To excel in her marketing career, travel to new places, improve her photography skills |
| Professional Goals | Develop and implement successful marketing campaigns, work with creative agencies for design projects |
| Pains | Tight deadlines, unresponsive vendors, outdated design trends |
| Main Challenges | Balancing competing priorities and tight deadlines, aligning messaging and design across multiple channels |
| Needs | High-quality design and messaging that aligns with her company's brand and objectives |
| Dreams | To collaborate with top-tier creative agencies and win awards for her marketing campaigns |

Table 04: SHOPPING BEHAVIORS

| Data Points | Answers |
| --- | --- |
| Budget | $5,000-$10,000 per project |
| Shopping Frequency | As needed for new marketing campaigns and design projects |
| Preferred Channels | Online research, professional networking, referrals |
| Online Behavior | Maya frequently researches creative agencies and reviews their portfolio and client testimonials. |
| Search Terms | "Creative agencies near me," "Top design agencies in [location]," "Brand design agency," "Marketing design" |
| Preferred Brands | Maya values collaboration and quality work, and is open to working with various creative agencies. |
| Triggers | Recommendations from professional network, impressive portfolio and client testimonials |
| Barriers | Budget constraints, unresponsive vendors, lack of creative collaboration or alignment with company brand |

To solve Maya's pain points and meet her needs, the Design Agency can offer personalized consultations to understand her marketing objectives and align messaging and design across multiple channels. The agency can also provide quick turnaround times and be highly responsive to Maya's communications. In addition, the agency can stay up-to-date on the latest design trends to ensure Maya's content remains fresh and on-trend.

Subject: Personalized Design Solutions for Your Marketing Campaigns

We understand how important it is to create visually appealing content that aligns with your brand and messaging. As a marketing manager with a passion for creative design, we believe that our agency can help you achieve your goals and exceed your expectations.
